data.text:
@DoctorLongscarf True, but the majority of our population is double vaxxed, booster doses have had a massive uptake as well, and Omicron is our prevalent strain here now which is considerably minor.
She obviously felt the risk was low enough. I very much doubt she didn't seriously consider it.

@MGranger223 Good to hear, I guess.  

Too bad COVID doesn’t make exceptions for people who are speaking or taking pictures…

@DoctorLongscarf Jodie wore a mask at all times except during photos and the talks. 
Everyone was also encouraged to take an LFT before attending.
@DoctorLongscarf up to her whether she felt safe there or not
@isoskramer @DoctorLongscarf Its mostly younger people and they in general here in the UK seem to believe they are invincible.
@DoctorLongscarf I was hoping geeks would be more sensible with masks and social distancing. But clearly that's too much to ask.
@DoctorLongscarf My first thought, ,and without knowing she was pregnant.
@DoctorLongscarf Maybe proof of vaccination was necessary? #fingerscrossed
